parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, or become stuck in a single gear, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls while driving
the transmission fails to shift
the vehicle is stuck in a single gear
the engine RPMs surge
the vehicle loses power
the check engine light illuminates
and the vehicle may produce unusual sounds or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clutch and Transmission Hydraulic System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and transmission hydraulic system can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, or become difficult to shift, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling and misfiring can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or become difficult to control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The engine stalls while driving
the vehicle misfires
the check engine light illuminates
the vehicle produces unusual sounds or vibrations
and the vehicle may experience a loss of power or acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of electronic and sensor systems can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The headlights fail to operate properly
the sensor fails to recognize the vehicle's gear
the reverse audible beep activates incorrectly
and the vehicle may experience other unusual electronic malfunctions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended movement of the vehicle can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if the vehicle is on an incline or in a situation where it can roll into a pedestrian or another vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle moves on its own without input from the driver
the vehicle climbs a hill without being in gear
and the vehicle may experience other unusual movements.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine oil drain plug can cause the engine to seize, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine oil drain plug falls out
causing the engine to lose oil
leading to engine failure
and warning lights may appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall or seize, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine dies or stalls while driving
warning lights appear on the dashboard
and the vehicle may not restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The check engine light illumination can indicate a potential engine problem, which if left unchecked, can lead to engine failure or other safety issues.
symptoms: The check engine light comes on
and the vehicle may experience issues such as misfires
engine stalling
or loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cooling system failure can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: Coolant leaks
engine overheating
and warning lights may appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idle STOP/START feature can cause the vehicle to shut off unexpectedly, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts off unexpectedly while driving
often without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical/system malfunctions can cause various issues, including engine stalling, loss of power, and safety system failures.
symptoms: Warning lights appear on the dashboard
CarPlay connectivity issues
and tire pressure warnings may appear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the horn in cold weather can compromise safety by preventing the driver from alerting others to imminent danger or collision.
symptoms: The horn fails to produce sound when depressed
or produces a weak sound that eventually grows louder with repeated pressing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to stall or shut down, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The transmission fails to engage or disengage
causing the vehicle to stall or shut down
with a code message displayed on the screen.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Idle Stop and Go System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idle stop and go system can cause the engine to shut down while driving, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The engine shuts down while stopped in traffic
and restarting the engine causes it to shut down again when the gas pedal is pressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Random Check Engine Light and Vehicle Shaking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The random occurrence of the check engine light and vehicle shaking can cause loss of control or accidents, especially on the highway.
symptoms: The check engine light turns on
and the vehicle begins to violently shake
which can be resolved by turning the engine off and on.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Power Lock and Engine Start Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power locks and engine start can cause the driver to be stranded, and potentially lead to accidents or safety risks.
symptoms: The power locks fail to work with the key fob
and the engine fails to start
with no warning lights or symptoms.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inconsistent engagement of the adaptive cruise control can cause sudden speed reductions, leading to potential accidents, traffic congestion, and driver frustration.
symptoms: The adaptive cruise control does not engage in a timely fashion
speed reduces 8-12 mph before it kicks in
speed always decreases 5-21 mph on every hill
unresponsive for a long duration resulting in reductions of speed of up to 11 MPH at highway speeds
takes up to 1 minute to recover speed
sudden hard braking with emergency warning flashed on the speedometer
failure to hold set speed
dropping 10-15 mph until it kicks in
and abrupt decreases in speed when recognizing a vehicle in front.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The adaptive cruise control's inability to maintain a set speed can cause sudden speed reductions, leading to potential accidents, traffic congestion, and driver frustration.
symptoms: The adaptive cruise control does not hold the set speed
speed drops 10-15 mph until it kicks in
and takes 10-30 seconds to re-engage after slowing down.
